reviews.text: Rating, 5 stars , · July 2025 , · Stayed a few nights Clean place, nice and cozy set up! ☺️ Very close to downtown LA and chinatown!

reviews.name: Karla
reviews.text: Rating, 5 stars , · 3 weeks ago , · Stayed a few nights great place Response from Dream Vacation 3 weeks ago Thank you, Karla, for choosing our guesthouse and leaving such a kind review. We’re glad you enjoyed your stay and would love to welcome you back anytime you’re in Alhambra.
